curriculum.title: SEO Fundamentals
curriculum.description: This curriculum is designed to introduce beginners to the fundamentals of Search Engine Optimization (SEO). It covers key concepts, strategies, and practical techniques to help learners improve the visibility and ranking of their websites on search engine results pages.
curriculum.targetAudience: Individuals new to SEO or looking to improve their website's search engine performance
learningOutcomes: Understand the basics of search engine algorithms and how they work
Identify and apply on-page SEO techniques to optimize website content
Implement effective off-page SEO strategies to build authority and backlinks
Utilize keyword research and analysis to drive targeted traffic
Measure and analyze SEO performance using relevant metrics and tools
